Class ObstacleList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.objects.ObstacleList

  • public class ObstacleList
extends java.lang.Object
    The obstacle list is defined here It contains methods that are useful for path planning

      ObstacleList clone() 
      void detected(ItemPosition blocker)
      add the detected obstacle to the current map Please avoid using this method on the gvh obstacle map, it will cause all other robot to detect this obstacle as well
      ObstacleList downloadObs()
      download method to provide robots with informations of unhidden obstacles sever as an selected deep copy
      void Gridfy()
      change the obstacle map to grid wise representation of obstacles, detect_Precision is the length of the grid, 1 as minimum
      void remove(ItemPosition robotPos, double radius) 
      void updateObs()
      methods for hidden or time vise obstacles Removes obstacles from ObList if they are too old

      return true if the path specified by two RRTNode has a line such that every point alone the line is reachable by robots.

      • validPath

        public boolean validPath(RRTNode destinationNode,
                         RRTNode currentNode,
                         int Radius)
        return true if the path specified by two RRTNode has a line such that every point alone the line is reachable by robots. It checks if two line segments smallest distance is bigger than radius For example, line AB and CD, the shortest distance is minimum of A to CD, B to CD, C to AB, D to AB
        Parameters:
        destinationNode -
        currentNode -
        Radius -
        Returns:

      • updateObs

        public void updateObs()
        methods for hidden or time vise obstacles Removes obstacles from ObList if they are too old

        public ObstacleList downloadObs()
        download method to provide robots with informations of unhidden obstacles sever as an selected deep copy
        Returns:

      • Gridfy

        public void Gridfy()
        change the obstacle map to grid wise representation of obstacles, detect_Precision is the length of the grid, 1 as minimum

      • detected

        public void detected(ItemPosition blocker)
        add the detected obstacle to the current map Please avoid using this method on the gvh obstacle map, it will cause all other robot to detect this obstacle as well
